insults: If I had a face like yours, I'd sue my parents.
Your birth certificate is an apology letter from the condom factory.
You're so ugly, when your mom dropped you off at school she got a fine for littering.
I'd slap you, but that would be animal abuse.
Some babies were dropped on their heads but you were clearly thrown at a wall.
Why don't you slip into something more comfortable... like a coma.
I don't know what your problem is, but I'll bet it's hard to pronounce.
You're like Monday mornings, nobody likes you.
I'd like to see things from your point of view but I can't seem to get my head that far up my ass.
You so dumb, you think Cheerios are doughnut seeds.
You're so ugly your portraits hang themselves.
If there were an infinite number of you pounding on type writers for an infinite amount of time, eventually, you'd say something intelligent.
He has a mechanical mind. Too bad he forgot to wind it up this morning.
He’s always lost in thought. It’s unfamiliar territory.
Is your ass jealous of the amount of shit that just came out of your mouth?
Two wrongs don't make a right, take your parents as an example.
You must have been born on a highway because that's where most accidents happen.
You sound a lot like the Terms and Conditions, that's why I don't give a shit about what you have to say.
